question: Suppose you have to fine-tune a pre-trained wav2vec 2.0 model on a new emotional‐speech dataset. Which steps would you follow (data preprocessing, training loop, hyperparameter tuning), and why?
transcript: I think fine tuning pre-trained wave to back as used to convert the wave forms into vector forms to be able to make the model able to train on vectors which are embeddings not the sound and waveform. So I think to find a new emotional speech in that process, I guess I'll short follow the previous lesson such as the documentation techniques, removing duplicates, removing nulls and all these things.
